title: Perfect
lyrics:
Soft lights, quiet nights, we sway in time
Footsteps in the grass, your hand in mine
I breathe you in and call it home

title: Shape of You
lyrics:
Neon corners, crowded rooms, we move
Heartbeat drums keep finding the groove
Closer now, the night pulls us through

title: Blinding Lights
lyrics:
City signs flicker on my skin
Empty streets and static wind
I chase the glow to feel again

title: Levitating
lyrics:
Silver skies and sugar rush
We lift off in a midnight hush
Gravity fades when we touch

title: Someone Like You
lyrics:
Tea grows cold on windowsills
Letters fold with quiet will
I wish you warmth beyond these hills

title: Watermelon Sugar
lyrics:
Sunshine drips down ocean lanes
Laugh lines cut through salty rain
July hums in sweet refrains

title: Stay
lyrics:
Clock hands stumble, rooms turn grey
Words fall short then drift away
If I could hold the morning—stay

title: As It Was
lyrics:
Hallway echoes of a younger call
Doors we never opened at all
I turn the key and face the fall

title: Bad Guy
lyrics:
Sideways smiles and quiet schemes
Candy-coated rebel dreams
Under beats, the siren gleams
album: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?

title: Peaches
lyrics:
Warm roads bend through summer towns
Sweet breeze lifts the windows down
We sing along to golden sounds

title: Flowers
lyrics:
Bloom again where shadows grew
Paint the room in brighter hues
Find the light that’s always you

title: Uptown Funk
lyrics:
Street brass pops and sneakers glide
Mirror balls catch city pride
Turn it up and take the ride
